skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: edifi podcasts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"The earth shall be full of the knowledge of the Lord as the waters cover the sea." (Isaiah 11:9) 

Are you looking for transformational and faith-inspiring Christian podcasts? Enable the Edifi Podcasts Skill — a truly powerful skill that brings together thousands of the best Christian podcasts in one place for your listening enjoyment.

Edifi is filled with the best Christian podcasts — safe content that will edify and inspire your faith. With the Edifi Podcasts Skill, you can easily listen to the latest episodes featured on Edifi along with popular channels. You can also quickly search for new podcasts by channel or topic, and discover phenomenal, new Christian podcasts in the process. 

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Just talk to Edifi Podcasts Skill. We'll have featured episodes and recommended channels if you’re not sure which podcasts to listen to. Or search podcasts or episodes by keywords when you want to listen to a specific podcast.

You can say...
-Alexa, open Edifi Podcasts
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcasts to play featured episodes
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcasts to play Rick Warren's podcast
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcasts to list recommended channels
-Alexa, ask Edifi Podcasts to search for podcasts about resurrection
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
